text: Ever since the news broke that Prince Harry was dating Meghan Markle, the actress has been flooded with negative criticism. Things did not change, or rather took a disgusting turn, when the couple announced their engagement. Numerous people expressed their unhappiness over the royal marrying the Suits star, prime among them being Harry's stepmother Camilla. However, the soon - to - be - royal has maintained her composure, not reacting to the negativity. While the royal family has also chosen to ignore this, apparently Kate Middleton has taken it upon herself to protect Markle. According to Australian magazine New Idea, the Duchess of Cambridge has vowed to shield Markle through the whole thing. ` ` Kate's been there and done that and knows how hard those first few weeks of royal life can be.
